thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Virginia Man Receives Two-Year Sentence for Manipulating Fitbit’s Stock Price

author: Maria Armental
title: Virginia Man Receives Two-Year Sentence for Manipulating Fitbit’s Stock Price
text:
A Virginia man who admitted to manipulating the market to drive up the stock price of Fitbit Inc. was sentenced Friday to two years in prison.
Robert W. Murray, 25 years old, was also sentenced in Manhattan federal court to two years of supervised release and ordered to return $3,914.08 in illegal gains for manipulating the market by filing a sham notice in November 2016 that made it seem like a Shanghai-based company intended to launch a takeover bid for the fitness-tracker maker.
...
